note: This is the account for Cheeky Kokako. Conservation biologist. Dungeons & Dragons lover. Board game fanatic. Probably the only person alive to have been gored by a Nilgiri tahr. Have also held more kakapos than more than 8 billion other humans have. Even more than Stephen Fry, I'd wager.

fields.name: Who is Thomas?
fields.value: He's just this guy, you know?

fields.name: Website:
fields.value: https://www.cheekykokako.com/

fields.name: RPG of choice:
fields.value: D&D 5E, but up for pretty much any others
